Header: 52 Division Gifts Deserving Students at Mirusuvil
Content: To coincide with the World Children's Day, 52 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) gifted school accessories, stationery and school shoes to a selected group of 49 deserving school students at Karampagam Government's Tamil Mixed School in Mirusuvil, following sponsorship provided by the ‘Shatter of the Silence’ charity organization on Monday (1). A lunch treat organized by the same 52 Division troops were also served to those students after the donation ceremony. The programme, launched with the blessings of the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi was supervised by the General Officer Commanding (GOC), 52 Division Major General Laksiri Waduge who also joined the occasion with donors. Members of the charity organization, Principal and teachers in the school and several Army personnel were associated with the event.
